item.title: Markdown Test
item.description: Testing every basic Markdown syntax. Headings Heading Heading Heading Heading Heading Heading Alternate Heading Alternate Heading Formattings This is a bold text. This is also bold. This is an italic text. this is also italic. This is a strikethrough text. This is a bold and italic text. Blockquotes This is how blockquote looks like, with multiple paragraphs, with nested blockquote, and with Markdown formatting. Code Blocks
item.content:
Testing every basic Markdown syntax.

Headings

Heading

Heading

Heading

Heading

Heading
Heading

Alternate Heading

Alternate Heading

Formattings

This is a bold text. This is also bold.
This is an italic text. this is also italic.
This is a strikethrough text.
This is a bold and italic text.

Blockquotes

This is how blockquote looks like,

with multiple paragraphs,

with nested blockquote,

and with Markdown formatting.

Code Blocks

This is a code block

public static void main(String[] args){
  System.out.println("This is a java code block in markdown.");
}

This is a code fence

if __name__ == __main__:
  print("This is a python code fence in markdown.")

Tables

Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
Left-aligned Centered Right-aligned

Lists

This is an ordered list:

  1. Basic syntax
    1. Heading
    2. Formatting
  2. Extended syntax

This is an unordered list:

  • Basic syntax
    • Heading
    • Formatting
  • Extended syntax
This is a definition list
This defines the term
